name: Precalculus
description:
Basic concepts of algebra and 
 trigonometry needed for calculus.

name: Calculus I
description:
Concepts of limits, 
derivatives, and integrals.

name: Calculus II
description:
Techniques of integration, infinite 
series, and basic differential equations.

name: Calculus III
description:
Multivariable calculus, multiple 
integrals, and vector theorems.

name: Calculus IV
description:
Advanced topics in calculus, such as Fourier 
analysis and partial differential equations.

name: Numerical Methods
description:
Numerical techniques for solving 
equations and calculus problems.

name: Introduction to Programming
description:
Basic programming concepts using
 an easy-to-learn programming language.

name: Programming Fundamentals
description:
Introduction to programming 
logic and basic algorithms.

name: Data Structures
description:
Study of fundamental data 
structures and their applications.

name: Web Application Development
description:
Development of web applications
 using modern technologies.

name: Artificial Intelligence
description:
Introduction to concepts and 
techniques of artificial intelligence.
